langCode.label: Default system language
langCode.help: Default system language for this Gebo.ai installation

LocalAdminExplanation.label: You'll use this account in the future to setup/administer the software, this data will remain local to your system and is not sent over the network

EnterBtn.label: Go to the login page to enter

AcceptMark.label: I accept the terms
AcceptMark.help: By clicking here you accept the term & conditions in the licence

adminUserSetupSection.label: Administrator & others account setup
adminUserSetupSection.description: At least an administration account is required to grant that this gebo.ai installation is properly managed, add other users if necessary

geboWorkDirectorySetupSection.label: Gebo.ai work directory
geboWorkDirectorySetupSection.description: Configure a work directory, it will be the folder where configurations and all working files of this installation will be stored. It's also a great idea to backup it periodically.

VectorStoreSetupSection.label: Vector database configuration
VectorStoreSetupSection.description: A vector database have to be configured for Gebo.ai to provide retrieve augmented generation services, you can choose between a local vector database, Qdrant or Mongo Atlas

oauth2SetupSection.label: Single signon, oauth2 authentication
oauth2SetupSection.description: Oauth2 single signon authentication and oauth2 clients configuration

adminLLMSSetupSection.label: Large language models setup
adminLLMSSetupSection.description: Configure various llms with cloud or local/lan infrastructure backend services, at least one chat model and one embedding models are to be configured to let the software work properly.

graphRagBaseSetupSection.label: Graph rag/Knowledge extraction stup
graphRagBaseSetupSection.description: Configure graph rag and knowledge extraction subsystem

sharedFileSystemSetupSection.label: Shared filesystems paths setup
sharedFileSystemSetupSection.description: Configure the company shared filesystems paths to be used as retrieve augmented generation documents area in various knowledge bases

atlassianConfluenceSystemSetupSection.label: Atlassian confluence integration
atlassianConfluenceSystemSetupSection.description: Configure Gebo.ai to access your Atlassian Confluence cloud or on premise installations

atlassianJiraSystemSetupSection.label: Atlassian jira integration
atlassianJiraSystemSetupSection.description: Configure Gebo.ai to access your Atlassian jira cloud installations

microsoftSharepointSystemSetupSection.label: Microsoft Sharepoint integration
microsoftSharepointSystemSetupSection.description: Configure Gebo.ai to access your Microsoft Sharepoint cloud or on premise installations

firstKnowledgeBaseSetupSection.label: Configure at least a knowledge base
firstKnowledgeBaseSetupSection.description: Configure at least a knowledge base to let your users enjoy the retrieve augmented generations services of Gebo.ai

firstChatProfileBaseSetupSection.label: Configure at least a "R.A.G." chat profile
firstChatProfileBaseSetupSection.description: Configure at least a retrieve augmented chat profile for your users based on one of your configured knowledge bases

InstructionText.label: Provide an api-key with proper available credit. If OpenAI is choosen you must add some specific credit (10-30$ can be enough) to your usual plan for api use, otherwise no available llms traffic will be available in this application.

MainPanel.label: Setup Gebo.ai llms providers access with your own api key

provider.label: Large language model supplier
provider.help: Choose one supplier between OpenAI (chatgpt), Google (Gemini),Anthropic (Claude)

user.label: User
user.help: Enter the user associated to the apiKey

apiKey.label: Api key
apiKey.help: Your api key of the LLMS providers to be used

MainPanel.label: Setup Graph Rag & knowledge extraction default configuration

workDirectory.label: Choose a folder as Gebo.ai work directory
workDirectory.help: Choose a server folder that this installation will use as work folder for its configurations and contents storage.

port.label: Qdrant port

usedModelConfiguration.help:
Specify large language model used for knowledge extraction, default one will be
                                    used if none is
                                    selected.

graphRagAllSources.label: Apply graph rag to all data sources
graphRagAllSources.help: If true all the knowledge bases/project/data sources will be processed for knowldge extraction, otherwise only those specifically configured will be

defaultModel.label: Default large language model
defaultModel.help: The default large language model will be used for knowledge extraction

processEveryDocument.label: Apply graph rag to all files
processEveryDocument.help:
The graph rag algoritms will be applied to all file this will enhance the
                                            details of
                                            analisys that the system is capable of but will high the cost and time
                                            required to process
                                            documents

contentSelectionFilter.label: File selection criterias for graphrag processing
contentSelectionFilter.help: Edit criterias on file to send to information extraction pipeline for graphrag, select at least a file name and criteria and/or a file type and/or the maximum number of bytes of file size and/or the age of last modification in days

userChoosesKnowledgeBases.label: User chooses knowledge bases
userChoosesKnowledgeBases.help: User can choose from accessible knowledge bases and/or upload its own files.

knowledgeBaseCodes.label: Knowledge bases
knowledgeBaseCodes.help: Knowledge bases to use for document retrivial.

similaritySearchThreshold.label: Similarity threshold
similaritySearchThreshold.help: Similarity threshold for semantic searches, 0.600.65 Low filtering, 0.70-0.75 Medium filtering, 0.800.85 Accurate

otherSearchSimilarityThreshold.label: 2nd 'hop' similarity threshold
otherSearchSimilarityThreshold.help: Similarity threshold for semantic searches, 0.600.65 Low filtering, 0.70-0.75 Medium filtering, 0.800.85 Accurate used from the 2nd search of multi-hop rag

disableMultiHopRag.label: Disable 'Multi Hop' rag
disableMultiHopRag.help: Disable the 'multi hop rag' functionality. Multi hop search does a first semantic search and uses found documents as a context for the semantic search itself providing a larger context.

topK.label: Considered document fragments (TopK)
topK.help: In the retrieve augmented generation, Top N found considered document fragments in semantic search

enabledFunctions.label: Enabled functions call for this RAG chat
enabledFunctions.help: Functionalities that could be used by the llm model during the chat with the user interacting also with the selected knowledge base
